Achievements.Name: Make the Jump
Achievements.Description: Infiltrate a cargo ship

Achievements.Name: Earn a Winged Dagger
Achievements.Description: Complete 'F.N.G.'

Achievements.Name: Win the War
Achievements.Description: Complete the game on any difficulty

Achievements.Name: Dancing in the Dark
Achievements.Description: Kill the power

Achievements.Name: Save the Bacon
Achievements.Description: Protect 'War Pig', the Abrams tank

Achievements.Name: Death From Above
Achievements.Description: Operate an AC-130 gun ship

Achievements.Name: Wrong Number
Achievements.Description: Find Al-Asad's safehouse

Achievements.Name: Piggyback Ride
Achievements.Description: Carry Cpt. MacMillian to safety

Achievements.Name: Desperate Measures
Achievements.Description: Corner Zakhaev's Son

Achievements.Name: Look Sharp
Achievements.Description: Find 15 enemy intel items

Achievements.Name: Eyes and Ears
Achievements.Description: Find 30 enemy intel items

Achievements.Name: Down Boy Down
Achievements.Description: Survive a dog attack

Achievements.Name: New Squadron Record
Achievements.Description: Complete the cargo ship mockup in less than 20 seconds

Achievements.Name: Rescue Roycewicz
Achievements.Description: Save Pvt. Roycewicz on the stairs

Achievements.Name: Your Show Sucks
Achievements.Description: Destroy all the TVs showing Al-Asad's speech

Achievements.Name: Man of the People
Achievements.Description: Save the farmer

Achievements.Name: Straight Flush
Achievements.Description: Kill 5 enemies with one shot while in the AC-130 gunship

Achievements.Name: Ghillies In The Mist
Achievements.Description: Complete 'All Ghillied Up' without alerting any enemies

Achievements.Name: Mile High Club
Achievements.Description: Sky dive to safety on Veteran difficulty

Achievements.Name: No Rest for the Weary
Achievements.Description: Stab an injured crawling enemy

Achievements.Name: Deep and Hard
Achievements.Description: Complete the game on Hardened or Veteran difficulty

Achievements.Name: The Package
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Crew Expendable' on Veteran difficulty

Achievements.Name: The Rescue
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Blackout' on Veteran difficulty

Achievements.Name: The Search
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Charlie Don't Surf' on Veteran difficulty

Achievements.Name: The Bog
Achievements.Description: Complete 'The Bog' and 'War Pig' on Veteran difficulty

Achievements.Name: The Escape
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Hunted' and 'Death From Above' on Veteran difficulty

Achievements.Name: The First Horseman
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Shock and Awe' on Veteran difficulty

Achievements.Name: The Second Horseman
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Safehouse' on Veteran difficulty

Achievements.Name: The Shot
Achievements.Description: Complete 'All Ghillied Up' and 'One Shot, One Kill' on Veteran difficulty

Achievements.Name: The Third Horseman
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Heat' and 'The Sins of the Father' on Veteran difficulty

Achievements.Name: The Ultimatum
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Ultimatum', 'All In', and 'No Fighting in the War Room' on Veteran difficulty

Achievements.Name: The Fourth Horseman
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Game Over' on Veteran difficulty

Achievements.Name: Daredevil
Achievements.Description: Kill an enemy while blinded by a flashbang in the single player campaign

Achievements.Name: Roadkill
Achievements.Description: Kill 2 enemies by blowing up a car in the single player campaign

Achievements.Name: Bird on the Ground
Achievements.Description: Shoot down an enemy helicopter with an RPG in the single player campaign

Achievements.Name: Four of a Kind
Achievements.Description: Kill 4 enemies in a row with headshots in the single player campaign

Achievements.Name: Three of a Kind
Achievements.Description: Kill 3 enemies in a row with your knife in the single player campaign
